name: MagicCrocusPro
description:
Flip cards to solve the solitaire:
🔥 You can only flip cards in groups (two or three).
🔥 When the card is turned upside down, you do not see the picture.
🔥 The orientation of the cards can be changed as a result of turns.
To solve the solitaire, all cards must be in the right place, face up and oriented in the right direction.
